text.language: }atywleb n~cemn/: ouoh e#y#u# qen hwb niben: y/etaci~ni nan m~V]: eftal/out e~jen necj~voi.
O chaste and undefiled, / holy in everything / who brought God to us / carried in her arms.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -2280.34px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Ya Perawan Maria tak bernoda, suci dalam segalanya, yang membawa Allah bagi kami.

text.language: أيتها الغير دنسة العفيفة القديسة فى كل شئ التى قدمت لنا الله محمولا على ذراعيها.
Crasi neme n~je ]k~t/cic t/rc: ecws e~bol ecjw m~moc: je ,ere y/eymeh n~hmot: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
The whole creation rejoices with you/ proclaiming and saying: / Hail to you O full of grace. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -2189.34px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Smua ciptaan bersuka denganmu,
dan berkata, "Salam bagimu, hai penuh karunia, Tuhan besertamu."

text.language: تفرح معكِ كل الخليقة صارخة قائلة السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة الرب معكِ.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -2073.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Tenermakarizin n~temetnis]: w~ ]paryenoc n~cab/: ten] ne m~pi,ereticmoc: nem Gabri/l piaggeloc.
We praise your greatness, / O the wise Virgin, / and send unto you greetings / with Gabriel the angel.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1833.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Kami puji kebesaranmu, ya Perawan bijaksana, kami kirimkan salam bagimu, bersama malaikat Gabriel.

text.language: نغبط عظمتك أيتها العذراء الحكيمة ونُعطيك السلام مع غبريال الملاك.
Je e~bolhiten pekarpoc: a~pioujai tahe pengenoc: a~V] hotpen e~rof n~kecop: hiten tefmeta~gayoc.
For through your fruit / salvation came to our race / and God has reconciled with us once again / through His goodness.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1742.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Sbab melalui Buahmu,kau damaikan kami lagi, dengan Allah, melalui kebaikan-Nya.

text.language: لأن من قبل ثمرتك أدرك الخلاص جنسنا وأصلحنا الله مرة أخرى من قبل صلاحه.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1626.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Hwc man~selet n~attako: a~Pip#n#a# e#y#u# i~ e~jw: oujom n~te v/et[oci: eynaerq/ibi e~ro Maria.
As an undefiled chamber, / the Holy Spirit came upon you, / and the power of the Most High / overshadowed you, O Mary.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1386.34px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Bak kamar pengantin tanpa cela,
Roh Kudus turun atasmu, dan kuasa Yang Mahatinggi, menaungimu, ya Maria.

text.language: كخدرٍ بغير فساد الروح القدس حل عليك وقوة العلى ظللتك يامريم.
Je a~rej~vo m~pia~l/yinoc: n~logoc n~S/ri n~te Viwt: eym/n e~bol sa e~neh: afi~ afcotten qen nennobi.
You bore the True Word, / the Son of the eternal Father, / who came and saved us / from our sins.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1270.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Kau telah lahirkan, Logos yang benar, Putera Bapa yang kekal, yang datang dan tebus dosa kami.

text.language: لأنك ولدت الكلمة الحقيقى ابن الآب الدائم إلى الأبد أتى وخلصنا من خطايانا.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -1179.33px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Nyo gar pe pigenoc: nem ]nouni n~te Dauid: a~remici nan kata carx: m~Penc#w#r# I/#c# P,#c#.
You are the race / and descendant of David. / You bore to us according to the flesh / our Savior Jesus Christ.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -939.314px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Kaulah keturunan, dari akar Daud,
kau telah lahirkan bagi kami, Juruselamat kami Yesus Kristus.

text.language: أنتِ هي جنس وأصل داود ولدت لنا جسدياً مخلصنا يسوع المسيح.
Pimonogen/c e~bol qen Viwt: qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou: afsouwf e~bol m~min m~mof: af[i n~oumorv/ m~bwk n~q/]: eybe penoujai.
The only-begotten of the Father / before all ages, / He emptied Himself and took the form of a servant / for our salvation.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -823.326px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Putera tunggal Bapa, sebelum segala masa, kosongkan diri-Nya dan ambil rupa hamba, darimu tuk keselamatan kami.

text.language: الوحيد من الآب قبل كل الدهور أخلى ذاته وأخذ شكل عبد منك لاجل خلاصنا.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -707.32px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Areswpi n~oumahc~nou] m~ve: hijen pikahi w~ ]macnou]: je afsai nan e~bol n~q/]: n~je pir/ n~te ]dikeo~cun/.
You became the second heaven / on earth, O Mother of God. / For the Sun of Righteousness / shone to us from you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -467.314px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Kau menjadi surga kedua, di bumi, ya Bunda Allah, karena darimulah Surya Kebenaran, menyinari kami.

text.language: صرتِ سماء ثانية على الأرض ياوالدة الإله لأنه أشرق لنا منكِ شمسُ البر.
Arej~vof hiten oup~rov/tia: a[ne j~roj n~attako: hwc d/miourgoc: ouoh n~logoc n~te Viwt.
You bore Him according to the prophecy / without seed or corruption. / He is the Creator / and the Word of the Father.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -351.326px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Kau telah lahirkan Dia sesuai nubuatan, tanpa benih atau kerusakan, sbab Dialah Pencipta, dan Firman dari Bapa.

text.language: ولدته كالنبوة بغير زرع ولا فساد وهو الخالق وكلمة الآب.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -235.31px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
}c~k/n/ y/e~toumou] e~roc: je y/e#y#u# n~te n/e#y#u#: e~re ]kibwtoc n~q/tc: etosj n~noub n~caca niben.
The dome which is called / the Holy of holies, / which contains the ark, / overlaid with gold from every side.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 4.68px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Tabernakel yang disebut, tempat mahakudus, yang berisi tabut, bundarannya dilapisi emas.

text.language: القبة التى تُدعى قدس الأقداس التى فيها التابوت المصفح بالذهب من كل ناحية.
Y/ e~re nip~lax n~q/tc: n~te ]dia~y/k/: nem pic~tamnoc n~noub: e~re pimanna h/p n~q/tf.
Wherein are the tablets / of the covenant / and the golden vessel / where the manna was hidden.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 95.68px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Dimana ada dua loh perjanjian, dan bejana emas, tempat manna disembunyikan.

text.language: الذى فيه لوحا العهد والقسط الذهبى المخفى فيه المن.
Foi n~tupoc m~Ps/ri m~V]: e~tafi~ afswpi qen Maria: ]paryenoc n~atywleb: af[icarx e~bol n~q/tc.
It is a symbol of the Son of God / who came and dwelt in Virgin Mary, / the unblemished, / and took flesh from her.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 186.68px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Inilah lambang Putra Allah, yang datang dan tinggal dalam Maria,Perawan tak bernoda,dan berinkarnasi darinya.

text.language: هو مثال لإبن الله الذى أتى وحل فى مريم العذراء غير الدنسة وتجسد منها.
Acj~vof e~pikocmoc: qen oumetouai n~atvwrj: alla n~yof pe p~ouro n~te p~w~ou: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
She gave birth to Him to the world. / He is united without separation. / For He is the King of glory; / He came and saved us.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 141px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 70.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 302.674px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 141px !important;

language.div: Maria melahirkan Dia ke dunia, dalam kesatuan tanpa pemisahan, sbab Dialah Raja kemuliaan, yang datang dan selamatkan kami.

text.language: ولدته للعالم باتحاد (اللاهوت) بغير افتراق إذ هو ملك المجد أتى وخلصنا.
Piparadicoc e~s~l/loui: je afi~ n~je pihi/b: n~logoc n~S/ri n~te Viwt eym/n e~bol sa e~neh: afi~ afcotten qen nennobi.
Paradise rejoices / for the coming of the Lamb, / the Word, Son of the Father, the Eternal, / to save us from our sins.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 443.686px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Firdaus bersuka, saat kedatangan Anak Domba, Sang Firman Putra dari Bapa yang kekal, datang tuk tebus dosa kami.

text.language: يتهلل الفردوس بمجئ الحَمَل الكلمة إبن الآب الدائم إلى الأبد ليخلصنا من خطايانا.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 141px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 70.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 559.69px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 141px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia, salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Aumou] e~ro je y~mau m~V]: piouro m~m/i menenca y~remacf: a~reo~hi e~reoi m~paryenoc: qen ouhwb m~paradoxon.
You are called the Mother of God, / the true King, / and after you delivered Him / you mysteriously remained a virgin.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 822.686px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Kau disebut Bunda Allah, Raja yang sejati, dan sesudah kau lahirkan Dia,
dengan ajaib kau tetap perawan.

text.language: دعيتِ أم الله الملك الحقيقى وبعد ما ولدته بقيت عذراء بأمرٍ عجيب.
Emmanou/l v/e~tarej~vof: eybe vai afa~reh e~ro: e~reoi n~attako: ectob n~je teparyenia.
Immanuel, whom you gave birth to, / guarded you / from corruption / and your virginity remained sealed.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 938.69px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Imanuel yang kau lahirkan, menjagamu, dari kecemaran, memeteraikan keperawananmu.

text.language: عمانوئيل الذى ولدته هو حفظك بغير فساد وبتوليتك مختومة.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1054.69px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
Aretenywn] e~]mouki: y/e~ta Iakwb nau e~roc: ec[oci sa e~h~r/i e~t~ve: e~re Po#c# hijwc qen ouho].
You are said to be like / the ladder that Jacob saw / ascending to heaven / and the feared Lord on it.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1294.67px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Engkau disamakan bak tangga, yang dilihat Yakub,naik ke surga, dan Allah yang ajaib di atasnya.

text.language: شُبهتِ بالسلم الذى رآه يعقوب مرتفعاً إلى السماء والرب المخوف عليه.
<ere ne e~bolhitoten: w~ y/etacswp e~roc m~pia~,writoc: qen tecm/tra m~paryenik/: ouoh ecsotem n~caca niben.
Hail to the one / who accepted in her womb, / the uncontainable, / and her virginity is sealed from every side.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1410.69px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Salam bagi dia yang menerima,
Yang Tak Terbatas dalam rahimnya,
dan keperawanannya, tetap termeterai.

text.language: سلامنا إلى من قبلت غير المحوى فى بطنها وبتوليتها مختومة من كل ناحية.
Areswpi nan n~oup~roctat/c: nahren V] penrefcw]: v/etaf[icarx e~bol n~q/]: eybe penoujai.
You became our intercessor / before God our Savior, / who was incarnate from you / for our salvation.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1526.67px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Kau tlah jadi pensyafaat kami, di hadapan Allah Juruselamat kami, yang berinkarnasi darimu,
untuk keselamatan kami.

text.language: صرت لنا شفيعة أمام الله مخلصنا الذى تجسد منكِ لأجل خلاصنا.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 118px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 59px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1642.67px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 118px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
H/ppe ic Po#c# afi~ e~bol n~q/]: w~ y/etc~mamat etj/k e~bol: e~nohem m~pikocmoc e~tafyamiof: eybe nefmetsenh/t etos.
Behold the Lord came forth from you, / O the blessed and perfect, / to save the world which He has created / according to His mercy.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1882.69px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Tuhan lahir darimu, hai yang terberkati dan sempurna, tuk selamatkan ciptaan-Nya, menurut belas kasih-Nya yang melimpah.

text.language: هوذا الرب خرج منكِ أيتها المباركة الكاملة ليخلص العالم الذى خلقه حسب كثرة رأفاته.
Tenhwc e~rof ten]w~ou naf: tenerhouo~ [ici m~mof: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: nai nan kata peknis] n~nai.
We praise and glorify Him, / and exceedingly exalt Him, / as the Good One and Lover of Mankind. / Have mercy on us according to Your great mercy.

qb-div.style: width: 311.328px !important; height: 141px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 155.664px 70.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1998.67px !important; margin-left: 796.328px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 311px !important; height: 141px !important;

language.div: Kami puji dan muliakan Dia, tinggikan Dia atas segalanya, Maha Baik dan Pengasih Manusia, kasihanilah kami menurut belas kasih-Mu yang besar.

text.language: نُسبحه ونُمجده ونُزيده علواً كصالح ومحب للبشر إرحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ,ere y/etacjem h~mot: ,ere y/etacmec P,#c#: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to you O full of grace. / Hail to you who has found grace. / Hail to you who has given birth to Christ. / The Lord is with you.

language.div: Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia,
salam bagimu yang dapat karunia,
salam bagimu yang melahirkan Kristus, Tuhan besertamu.

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة السلام لك يامن وجدتِ نعمة السلام لك يامن ولدت المسيح الرب معكِ.
